suslog.name: suslog

messages.noSusActivity: Hmmmmm... I haven't seen any suspicious activity yet. Good job.... for now...

suslog.usage:
Usage: !suslog [number | last] [@user1 @user2 ...] [help]
[@user1 @user2 ...]		Filter the suslog by one or more users.
[number | last]	Specify the number of messages to retrieve, or retrieve the last message.
[help]		Display this usage message.

commands.default: Hmmmm, I'm not sure what your trying to do.
